caption:
A Special Note from Our Co-Founder, Amberlee 💙

20 years ago, long before candles were part of my journey, I had the incredible honor of being a founding member of DanceBlue at the University of Kentucky. 🎗️

DanceBlue is a fully student-run organization dedicated to raising funds year-round for the DanceBlue Hematology/Oncology Clinic. The event culminates in a 24-hour, no sitting, no sleeping dance marathon. Since 2006, more than $23 million has been raised to support pediatric cancer research and treatment. This weekend in Lexington, over 1,000 students are coming together to lead and participate in this extraordinary event.

I could easily write a book about my passion for DanceBlue—a passion that sparked my journey in design and has shaped my path as an entrepreneur. It’s a privilege to return each year to contribute in new ways.

Earlier this year, we introduced a special collaboration: our DanceBlue Reusable Rocks Glass Candle. This unique candle captures the spirit of this incredible cause and serves as a meaningful keepsake long after it’s burned. ✨

To learn more and support our philanthropic efforts, please visit the link in our bio. Every contribution counts! 💙
